column4: halfway through printing jobs, my printer stops printing, pauses for a while then spits out the page half printed, then a lsusb command shows no printer at all,anyone had this problem?
hmm possible causes, faulty usb port, faulty cable, a bug in the driver itself, printer power button etc
if you dont see any of thse issues in windows, then its a driver issue
so canon supplies the drivers for this? or ubuntu automatically does?
seems like a driver issue frankly, write to cannon maybe
